CommonEvent.Name: LogMart Suspend Log Processing Flag Disabled
LogMart Suspend Log Processing Flag Enabled
Software Uninstalled
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: Product: LogRhythm System Monitor Service -- Removal completed successfully.

CommonEvent.Name: Software Installed
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: Product installation completed successfully.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Signature Update Failure Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of signature update failures in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 11.4.a-c

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Software Update Failure Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of software update failures in direct support of PCI-DSS Controls: 6.2.b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Configuration Deleted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on deleting configurations within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Configuration Disabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on disabling configurations within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Configuration Modified Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on modifying configurations within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Modem Enabled/Installed Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on enabled/installed modems within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Audit Logging Stopped Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on audit logging being stopped.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Configuration Change Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on configuration changes.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Software Installed Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of software installations by Impacted Host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Audit Logging Stoppage Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC10.1 by alerting on all audit logging stoppage.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Configuration Change Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 controls PMC3.7, PMC4.7, PMC4.8, PMC4.9, PMC4.13, and PMC5.6 by providing details on all configuration changes.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Signatures Updated Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 controls PMC2.2, PMC3.9, PMC4.4, PMC5.13, and PMC6.16 by providing details on signature update failures.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Software Installation Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC4.10 by providing details of all software installation activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Software Uninstallation Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC4.10 by providing details of all software uninstallation activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Software Updated Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC4.10 by providing details of all software update success activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: SANS: Config Disabled
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Configuration disabled within the organization infrastructure. SANS Top 20

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Audit Logging Stopped Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on audit logging being stopped.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Configuration Change Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on configuration changes.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Boundary Anti-Malware Policy Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on policy and configuration change logs from Anti-Malware software.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Software Installed Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of software installations by Impacted Host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Bndry Mon Dvce Config/Policy Chg
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any change to boundary monitoring device configurations or policies to supplement testing of GPG-13 control PMC3.7.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Attck Recog Software Policy Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any change to boundary attack recognition software policies (signature) to supplement testing of GPG-13 control PMC3.9.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Intrnl Bndry Monitoring Dvc Chg
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any change to internal boundary monitoring device configurations or policies to supplement testing of GPG-13 control PMC5.6 [Alert A].

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Ops Config: New AutoRun Process
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: New process configured to run at startup on a host.
Endpoint Analytics - ETA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Ops Config: Deleted
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Configuration deleted within the organization infrastructure.
Endpoint Analytics - ETA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Ops Config: Disabled
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Configuration disabled within the organization infrastructure.
Endpoint Analytics - ETA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Ops Config: Config Modified
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Configuration modified within the organization infrastructure.
Endpoint Analytics - ETA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Configuration or Policy Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any change to any device configurations or policies within the defined environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Windows Firewall Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts when a change occurs to host's Windows Firewall, based on the following vendor message IDs:

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: Config/Policy Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event when a change to any device configurations or policies within the defined environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: Software Installation Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates an event and alerts on any software installation activity across the environment

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: Windows Firewall Change
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts when a change occurs to host's Windows Firewall, based on specific vendor message IDs.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: BSI:IT-G: Windows Registry-nderung: AutoRun
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: BSI:IT-Grundschutz: B3.108 nderung in der Windows Registry in einer der bekannten
M3.344

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Signature Update Failure Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of signature update failures.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Software Update Failure Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of software update failures.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Configuration Change Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on configuration changes.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Change Record Statistics
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides custom statistics on configuration change record events. Default expressions are to be modified accordingly.
